start.text: "Age 19.. Case Report S.. cause of death.. strangulation..." A person in front of me mumbles as they write something on a sheet of paper.

scene_001.speaker: protagonist
scene_001.text: "H - huh..?" I stuttered, but the person doesn't seem to notice.

scene_002.text: I look at my surroundings but it feels strange. I can see clearly but at the same time I see nothing. | It seems cold, | but I don't necessarily feel it. | I can't understand nor describe what I'm feeling, | I feel like I'm breathing but I don't feel my chest moving.

scene_003.text: I don't feel my chest, | or rather my heart, | beating at all.

scene_005.speaker: protagonist
scene_005.text: "Fuck, so it worked," | I chuckled beneath my breath and that's when I see it, | a red glow facing me. | It took me a while to realize that it's an eye which belonged to the person I saw.

scene_006.text: Their two colored eyes look straight at me but somehow I can see it move, | the pupils dilate from time to time and the cornea shakes constantly. | It doesn't look human.

scene_007_high.speaker: kiupita
scene_007_high.text: The person tilted their head. | "Ask that to yourself, you just died."

scene_007_low.speaker: kiupita
scene_007_low.text: "Oh, you're dead. | I'm collecting your soul."

scene_008.speaker: protagonist
scene_008.text: "Oh." | I don't know how to react. | By now it's quite obvious to me that I'm dead, so that information didn't really help me.

scene_010_high.speaker: kiupita
scene_010_high.text: "Hm, Curious about me? | Like I told you, I'm your soul collector. | We will be working together in the same division for now on, so let's be in good terms for now on, | for your own good"

scene_010_low.speaker: kiupita
scene_010_low.text: "Oh, | I thought it was obvious, | sorry. | It's a place between life and death of course. | Because of your cause of death, my division is the one to pick you up."

scene_012_high.speaker: kiupita
scene_012_high.text: "Hah! | Getting so familiar already? | Say.. | have you ever experienced love?"

scene_012_next.speaker: kiupita
scene_012_next.text: "I find love fascinating. | Someone in the past told me all about it you know"
